      static java.math.BigDecimal calcSecondaryAmount(IPairedMoney primaryComponent, java.math.BigDecimal value, java.math.BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride, java.math.RoundingMode roundingMode)
      Calculates the secondary money amount, but does not set it. Returns null if the primaryComponent does not have a secondary component, of if the primary amount is null.

    • Method Detail

      • calcSecondaryAmount

        java.math.BigDecimal calcSecondaryAmount(IPairedMoney primaryComponent,
                                       java.math.BigDecimal value,
                                       java.math.BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride,
                                       java.math.RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Calculates the secondary money amount, but does not set it. Returns null if the primaryComponent does not have a secondary component, of if the primary amount is null.
        Parameters:
        primaryComponent - primary money component
        value - primary amount value
        exchangeRateOverride - if not null, will override the default exchange rate
        roundingMode - mode to use when rounding secondary amount to storageScale of secondary Currency. Use Transaction.RoundingMode, or leave as null.
        Returns:
        may be null
